welcome_message_body: Welcome to Burzaco, Argentina! Known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Palomar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at El Palomar Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network after accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within Argentina.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from Argentina.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
